Name: Fisticubes - One Button Boxing!
About the game: Fisticubes is a goofy physics-based one-button boxing party game where up to 4 players compete to destroy each other! Enjoy such features as: Single-player tournament mode! 1v1 your way to the championship! Online multiplayer with Steam's Remote Play Together /#together A growing selection of different arenas! Plenty of match-making options! 2-4 player support with customizable controls! Anvils that destroy the very floor beneath you! Bombs that launch you in any and every direction! Vegetables that make you grow bigger than your enemies! Springs that launch you upwards to get the drop on your foes! Colour Blind Accessibility! Bots for offline and friendless play! First-person mode!* Virtual-reality mode!* ** *** Credits: Artwork by Bethany Coyles Music by The Flaming Pike Trailer by Josh Curry-Glasper *First-person mode & virtual-reality mode are only available in the single-player tournament mode. **Please ensure you have enough space around you to avoid hitting objects and/or walls and take all necessary precautions before using VR mode! ***VR mode is limited at this time and still in development.
